title: Publish the app (deployment readiness + valid domain slug)

requirements.text: Add a production publishing checklist and deployment steps document that explains how to deploy the backend canister and the frontend assets to the Internet Computer, including how to configure a custom domain and the exact domain slug constraints (5–50 chars; letters, numbers, hyphens only).
acceptanceCriteria: A new documentation file exists in the repo (e.g., DEPLOYMENT.md or README section) describing: build, deploy, upgrade, and how to attach a custom domain.
The document explicitly states the domain slug validation rules: 5–50 characters and only letters, numbers, and hyphens.
The document includes an example of converting the desired name "child access control" into a valid slug (e.g., "child-access-control").

requirements.text: Update user-facing app metadata to reflect the new app name "Child Access Control" consistently where it appears in the UI and page metadata, without using invalid domain characters.

quotes: Rename this to child access control

acceptanceCriteria: The browser tab title (frontend/index.html) uses an English title consistent with "Child Access Control".
The header branding in the app shell remains consistent and does not reference invalid domain strings or previously failed domain attempts.

requirements.text: Ensure the frontend routing and asset paths work correctly when the app is served from a custom domain over HTTPS, including direct navigation to routes like /dashboard, /alarm, and /limitations and loading generated assets from /assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: A production build loads successfully and can navigate directly to /, /dashboard, /alarm, and /limitations without a blank page.
The generated icon referenced by the app shell (e.g., /assets/generated/alarm-bell-icon.dim_512x512.png) loads correctly in production.
No changes are made to any frontend immutablePaths files (hooks and ui components listed as immutable).

constraints: Respect the single-actor backend architecture: all Motoko logic remains in backend/main.mo; add backend/migration.mo only if a state upgrade is required.

Do not modify any files under frontend immutablePaths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui). Compose existing UI components instead.
Domain slug must be 5–50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens.
nonGoals: Implementing new product features unrelated to publishing (e.g., new alarm logic, new biometric/touch schemas, new dashboard features).
Adding third-party hosting, external databases, or non-Internet-Computer deployment targets.
Adding third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
